parallel.distributed

Class DRLockReleaseRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.distributed.DRLockReleaseRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, DMsgIntf

    public class DRLockReleaseRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements DMsgIntf
    implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DRWLockSrv identified by name to release from the current thread a global read-lock. Not for use as part of the normal public API. Only works with DActiveMsgPassingCoordinatorLongLivedConn[Clt/Srv] objects.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2014

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute(java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
             throws java.io.IOException
        release the read-lock (via sockets) from the FairDMCoordinator object named in the constructor. These methods work only when invoked on the server from the same thread for each remote thread connecting to the server, thus the need for the long-lived connection objects mentioned in the header comments.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface DMsgIntf
        Parameters:
        oos - ObjectOutputStream
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
